  • Csob

Payment

Payment.php : 15

A payment request.

To init new payment, you need to create an instance of this class and fill its properties with real information from the order.

$closePayment  : bool|null
Should the payment be processed right on? See Wiki on ČSOB's github for more information.
$colorSchemeVersion  : int
Color version
$currency  : string
Currency of the transaction. Default value is "CZK".
$customerId  : string
Your customer's ID (e-mail, number, whatever...)
$description  : string
Description of the order that will be shown to customer during payment process.
$language  : string
Language of the gateway. Default is "CZ".
$logoVersion  : int
Version of logo.
$orderNo  : string
Number of your order, a string of 1 to 10 numbers (this is basically the Variable symbol).
$payMethod  : string
payMethod value. Leave empty to use the default (and the only one valid) value.
$payOperation  : string
payOperation value. Leave empty to use the default (and the only one valid) value.

Return method. Leave empty to use the default one.

Return URL to send your customers back to.

Lifetime of the transaction in seconds. Number from 300 to 1800.

Should the payment be processed right on? See Wiki on ČSOB's github for more information.

public bool|null $closePayment = null

Payment.php : 80

Return URL to send your customers back to.

addCartItem()

Payment.php : 258

Add one cart item.

public addCartItem(string $name, number $quantity, number $totalAmount[, string $description = "" ]) : Payment

You are required to add one or two cart items (at least on API v1).

Remember that $totalAmount must be given in hundredth of currency units (cents for USD or EUR, "halíře" for CZK)

Parameters
$name : string

Name that customer will see (will be automatically trimmed to 20 characters)

$quantity : number
$totalAmount : number

Total price (total sum for all $quantity), in hundredths of currency unit

$description : string = ""

Aux description (trimmed to 40 chars max)

Tags
throws
Exception

When more than 2nd cart item is to be added or other argument is invalid

Return values
Payment —

Parameters
